steps.name: Given I Logged in with email <email_1> and password <password_1>
When I add product <productName_1> to the Cart
And Checkout <productName_1> and submit the Order
Then <confirmMessage_1> message is displayed on Confirmation Page
And I should see the Order on Order History Page
